title: Fargo
summary: Car salesman sets up kidnapping. Coens' snowbound film noir, merry and macabre.

title: Home Sweet Home Alone
summary: Dan Mazer’s film, streaming on Disney+, is a painful spiritual sequel to the 1990 hit.
